mapper.sql: number, month, name, post_salary, salary_salary, job_allowance, merit_salary, wages_payable, individual_tax, net_salary, password
mapper.insert: insert into workers_salary (number, month, name, post_salary, salary_salary, job_allowance, merit_salary, wages_payable, individual_tax, net_salary, password) values (#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{salarySalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{jobAllowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{meritSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{wagesPayable,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{individualTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into workers_salary
number,
month,
name,
post_salary,
salary_salary,
job_allowance,
merit_salary,
wages_payable,
individual_tax,
net_salary,
password,

mapper.update:
update workers_salary
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_salary = #{postSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
salary_salary = #{salarySalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
job_allowance = #{jobAllowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
merit_salary = #{meritSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
wages_payable = #{wagesPayable,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
individual_tax = #{individualTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
net_salary = #{netSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update workers_salary set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_salary = #{postSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, salary_salary = #{salarySalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, job_allowance = #{jobAllowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, merit_salary = #{meritSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, wages_payable = #{wagesPayable,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, individual_tax = #{individualTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, net_salary = #{netSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from workers_salary where number not like 'gl%'
select * from workers_salary where number like #{number ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and number not like 'gl%'
select * from workers_salary where name LIKE #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and number not like 'gl%'
select * from workers_salary where month LIKE #{month ,jdbcType=INTEGER} and number not like 'gl%'
